actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means..

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to authorize coverage under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program (through State agreements) of certain services performed by inmates of State and local penal and mental institutions.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Social Security Act, coverage under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program (through State agreements) of services performed by inmates of State and local penal and mental institutions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to authorize coverage under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program (through State agreements) of certain services performed by inmates of State and local penal and mental institutions.
